trans-unit.source: Basic Service Bus Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: Basic Service Bus Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: Basic Service Bus Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: Basic Service Bus Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> enables web service applications to expose their functionality to clients through firewalls and on different application platforms.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> enables web service applications to expose their functionality to clients through firewalls and on different application platforms.

trans-unit.source: This topic outlines the tasks that are required to build an application that uses <token>sb2</token> to expose its functionality to clients.
trans-unit.target: This topic outlines the tasks that are required to build an application that uses <token>sb2</token> to expose its functionality to clients.

trans-unit.source: For a working sample application, see the <link xlink:href="24332c3c-277f-46f2-949a-d4381b8bfb0b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">AppFabric Service Bus Tutorial</link>.
trans-unit.target: For a working sample application, see the <link xlink:href="24332c3c-277f-46f2-949a-d4381b8bfb0b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">AppFabric Service Bus Tutorial</link>.

trans-unit.source: Basic Service Bus tasks
trans-unit.target: Basic Service Bus tasks

trans-unit.source: The tasks required to create a <token>indigo1</token> application that accesses <token>sb2</token> are as follows.
trans-unit.target: The tasks required to create a <token>indigo1</token> application that accesses <token>sb2</token> are as follows.

trans-unit.source: If you are hosting in <token>azure_1</token>, see <link xlink:href="70072016-3a35-45ed-a833-8153e4201d7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure and AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>.
trans-unit.target: If you are hosting in <token>azure_1</token>, see <link xlink:href="70072016-3a35-45ed-a833-8153e4201d7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure and AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a REST-style application with <token>sb2</token>, see <link xlink:href="680a23d3-efb1-4be0-8feb-e552bcaf5eb3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">REST and AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use a REST-style application with <token>sb2</token>, see <link xlink:href="680a23d3-efb1-4be0-8feb-e552bcaf5eb3" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">REST and AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>.

trans-unit.source: Create a <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create a <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: This <token>servicensd</token> creates a named scope within which <token>sb2</token> creates resources to support Web services regardless of how or where they are originally hosted.
trans-unit.target: This <token>servicensd</token> creates a named scope within which <token>sb2</token> creates resources to support Web services regardless of how or where they are originally hosted.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="95fd7efd-7a4b-49c8-8eea-297d24c9ee08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Service Bus Service Namespaces</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="95fd7efd-7a4b-49c8-8eea-297d24c9ee08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Service Bus Service Namespaces</link>.

trans-unit.source: Define the service contract, whether using <token>indigo2</token> or using HTTP programming directly in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Define the service contract, whether using <token>indigo2</token> or using HTTP programming directly in the .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: A contract specifies the signature of the service, the data it exchanges, and other required inputs, behavior specifications, and object invariants.
trans-unit.target: A contract specifies the signature of the service, the data it exchanges, and other required inputs, behavior specifications, and object invariants.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.

trans-unit.source: Implement the contract.
trans-unit.target: Implement the contract.

trans-unit.source: To implement a service contract, create a class that implements the interface and specify custom runtime behavior.
trans-unit.target: To implement a service contract, create a class that implements the interface and specify custom runtime behavior.

trans-unit.source: Configure the service by specifying endpoint and other behavior information.
trans-unit.target: Configure the service by specifying endpoint and other behavior information.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.

trans-unit.source: Build and run the service.
trans-unit.target: Build and run the service.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="5f8947bc-26c6-4b15-a3a4-74bd3a0edb58" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building a Service for the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="5f8947bc-26c6-4b15-a3a4-74bd3a0edb58" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building a Service for the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.

trans-unit.source: Build and run the client application.
trans-unit.target: Build and run the client application.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="3468b3db-91b6-4e76-a5ff-216d4c765d05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building an AppFabric Service Bus Client Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="3468b3db-91b6-4e76-a5ff-216d4c765d05" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Building an AppFabric Service Bus Client Application</link>.

trans-unit.source: As with any iterative, service-oriented software development, it may not always be appropriate to follow the previous steps sequentially, or even start from step 1.
trans-unit.target: As with any iterative, service-oriented software development, it may not always be appropriate to follow the previous steps sequentially, or even start from step 1.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to build a client for a pre-existing service, start at step 5.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you want to build a client for a pre-existing service, start at step 5.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you are building a host service that others will use, you can skip step 6.
trans-unit.target: Or, if you are building a host service that others will use, you can skip step 6.
